name: Archive Of Our Own Works (A03) Customization
description: Illustrates what controls what on the page so that you can customize the page while reading works. It gives you instructions on how to change the background colors (if you want a darker page), fonts (maybe AO3's fonts are too small for you to read and you need something larger), allows you to change the width of the text, etc.
additional_info: It isn't made for the other page on AO3 like the search, fandoms, etc. It is only to be used when viewing works. It was made for Firefox and have not sorted it out on Chrome. So, I can neither guarantee it will work or work well in Chrome. I'll fix that later.
